p: The effects of the BRTâ€™s hyperparameters on the survival outcome were consistent with those in the published literature [ 10], with AUCs greater than 70% and less than 90% indicating appreciable predictive performance [ 21]. The data to which we fitted the BRT model were large relative to typical epidemiological datasets in outbreak settings; however, our method proved robust to changes in sample sizes, with comparable mean imputation performances reported even after data downsampling ( Supplementary Figure 3).
